Line 33: Line 33:
===Operating System===
===Operating System===
â
[[Linux]] is the [[operating system]] (OS) of choice for IRLP, as it allows the best in reliability, programmability, efficiency, and functionality. Most older IRLP nodes use the [[Red Hat Linux|Red Hat]] 7.3 or Red Hat 9 distribution, as they were very stable releases and ran very smoothly on any [[Pentium]] or better computer. In 2005, a custom version of [[Fedora (Linux distribution)|Fedora]] Core 3 was introduced, followed by Fedora Core 5 in 2006. As of March 2007, IRLP no longer supports Red Hat and started shipping with the [[CentOS]] 4.4 distribution. This release provides greatly improved operation with more support for audio cards.
+
[[Linux]] is the [[operating system]] (OS) of choice for IRLP, as it allows the best in reliability, programmability, efficiency, and functionality. Most older IRLP nodes use the [[Red Hat Linux|Red Hat]] 7.3 or Red Hat 9 distribution, as they were very stable releases and ran very smoothly on any [[Pentium]] or better computer. In 2005, a custom version of [[Fedora (operating system)|Fedora]] Core 3 was introduced, followed by Fedora Core 5 in 2006. As of March 2007, IRLP no longer supports Red Hat and started shipping with the [[CentOS]] 4.4 distribution. This release provides greatly improved operation with more support for audio cards.
===IRLP Hardware===
===IRLP Hardware===
